text: @DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump To bad we all can’t celebrate, you know the dead ones because your father had to golf and hold pep rallies during the month of February and not prepare our Country. And this coronavirus was a Democratic hoax too , daddy said that at a pep rally.
